universum.studios.android.fragment.annotation

Annotation Type MenuOptions


  • @Target(value=TYPE)
 @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
public @interface MenuOptions
    Defines an annotation for determining how a Menu should be set.
    Author:
    Martin Albedinsky

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Fields and Description
      static int BEFORE_SUPER
      Flag indicating that a menu should be created before a super's one.
      static int DEFAULT
      Fag indicating that a default menu set up should be used.
      static int IGNORE_SUPER
      Flag indicating that the creation of a super's menu should be ignored.

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      boolean clear
      Flag indicating whether to clear the already created menu or not.
      int flags
      Flags for determining a menu set up.
      int value
      A resource id of the desired xml menu.

    • Field Detail

      • DEFAULT

        public static final int DEFAULT
        Fag indicating that a default menu set up should be used.

      • IGNORE_SUPER

        public static final int IGNORE_SUPER
        Flag indicating that the creation of a super's menu should be ignored.

      • BEFORE_SUPER

        public static final int BEFORE_SUPER
        Flag indicating that a menu should be created before a super's one.

    • Element Detail

      • value

        @MenuRes
public abstract int value
        A resource id of the desired xml menu.

        Default value: 0

        Default:
        0

      • clear

        public abstract boolean clear
        Flag indicating whether to clear the already created menu or not.
        Default:
        false

      • flags

        public abstract int flags
        Flags for determining a menu set up.
        Default:
        0
